content: What popular social media platform was launched in 2004 by Mark Zuckerberg and fellow Harvard College students?

That would be Facebook, which was indeed launched in February 2004 by Mark Zuckerberg along with his college roommates and fellow Harvard University students Eduardo Saverin, Andrew McCollum, Dustin Moskovitz, and Chris Hughes. It started as a way for Harvard students to connect and share information with each other, and it has since grown into one of the world's largest social media platforms, with billions of active users worldwide.
